  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205432</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Musical Instruments: Wil Blades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikinstrumente: Wil Blätter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instruments Musicaux : Lames de Wil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrumentos Musicais: Lâminas De Wil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strumenti Musicali: Lamierine Di Wil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσικά όργανα: Λεπίδες Wil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Instrumentos Musicales: Láminas De Wil</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Spark visits organ player Wil Blades as he jams with Dr. Lonnie Smith at San Francisco's Boom Boom Room. This Educator Guide is about jazz, the history of the Hammond B3 organ, and the science of electronic instruments.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funken besucht Organspieler Wil Blätter, während 
er mit Dr. Lonnie Smith am Hochkonjunktur-Hochkonjunktur-Raum San 
Franciscos staut. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung ist über Jazz, die 
Geschichte des Hammond B3 Organs und die Wissenschaft der 
elektronischen Instrumente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'étincelle visite des lames de Wil de joueur 
d'organe pendant qu'il bloque avec Dr. Lonnie Smith à la pièce de 
perche de perche de San Francisco. Ce guide d'éducateur est au
sujet du jazz, de l'histoire de l'organe de Hammond B3, et de la 
science des instruments électroniques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A faísca visita as lâminas de Wil do jogador do 
órgão enquanto atola com Dr. Lonnie Smith no quarto do crescimento 
do crescimento do San Francisco. Esta guia do educador é sobre 
o jazz, o history do órgão de Hammond B3, e a ciência de 
instrumentos eletrônicos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La scintilla visita le lamierine di Wil del 
giocatore dell'organo mentre si inceppa con il Dott. Lonnie Smith alla
stanza dell'asta dell'asta de San Francisco. Questa guida 
dell'educatore è circa jazz, la storia dell'organo di Hammond B3 e la
scienza degli strumenti elettronici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεπίδες Wil φορέων οργάνων επισκέψεων σπινθήρων 
όπως φράσσει με το Δρ Lonnie Smith στο δωμάτιο βραχιόνων 
βραχιόνων του Σαν Φρανσίσκο. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών 
είναι για την τζαζ, την ιστορία του B3 οργάνου Hammond, και 
την επιστήμη των ηλεκτρονικών οργάνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La chispa visita las láminas de Wil del jugador 
del órgano mientras que él atora con el Dr. Lonnie Smith en el sitio
del auge del auge de San Francisco. Esta guía del educador 
está sobre jazz, la historia del órgano de Hammond B3, y la ciencia 
de instrumentos electrónicos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

  </description>
